description: Set back slightly from the port, this restaurant boasts stunning views from its terrace which is highly recommended in fine weather. The culinary focus here is on modern dishes with an interesting choice of meat and fish options. Tea and kombucha offer an alternative to wine, while the home-produced gin is definitely worth sampling.
